name: My workspace

on:
  push:
  pull_request:
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
    myfirstjob: 
              name: First job
              runs-on: ubuntu-latest
              steps:
              - name: Step One
                uses: actions/checkout@v3
              - name: Step Two
                run: |
                  touch newfile.yaml
                  echo "Some random text for the example" >> newfile.yaml
                  cat newfile.yaml
                  pwd
